name: d3-line-range
description: d3 v4 line chart with confidence interval

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -f umd -n d3 -o build/d3-line-range.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-line-range.js -c -m -o build/d3-line-range.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/d3-line-range.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-line-range.js build/d3-line-range.min.js
